mapper.select: SELECT R, BOARD.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARDSEQ) AS R, S.BOARDSEQ, S.ID, S.BOARDNO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.REGDATE, S.VIEWCNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANSBOARD WHERE BOARDSEQ=S.BOARDSEQ) AS ANSCNT FROM BOARD S) BOARD WHERE R >= #{pageStart} AND R<= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum}-1)

SELECT R, BOARD.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARDSEQ) AS R, S.BOARDSEQ, S.ID, S.BOARDNO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.REGDATE, S.VIEWCNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANSBOARD WHERE BOARDSEQ=S.BOARDSEQ) AS ANSCNT FROM BOARD S WHERE S.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') BOARD WHERE R >= #{pageStart} AND R<= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum}-1)
